title: Rikke and Syttende Mai; May 17th, Norwegian Constitution Day
description: Today is a special day, Rikke can tell when she awakes to the sound of a festive parade nearby. In the kitchen the family is getting ready to celebrate, while Mor and Far are feeling a bit sentimental as they hum a strange song... Learn about this traditional Norwegian Holiday with the Littlest Troll of Norway, sure to excite Norwegians and non Norwegians alike!
author: Nikolina Nilsen
